sentences: Dušan "Koja" Kojić (Serbian Cyrillic: Душан Којић Која; born 14 June 1961) is a Serbian rock bassist, singer, and songwriter.
He is the frontman of the Serbian Alternative rock band Disciplin A Kitschme (formerly known as Disciplina Kičme).
Bistriji ili tuplji čovek biva kad... (1981)
Paket aranžman (1980) - with Električni orgazam and Idoli
Kako je propao rokenrol (1989) - with Vlada Divljan and Srđan Gojković
with the band Nova Moćna Organizacija
